column1: Gannavaram Assembly constituency is a constituency in Krishna district of Andhra Pradesh
column2: representing the state legislative assembly in India. It is one of the seven assembly segments of Machilipatnam (Lok Sabha constituency)
column7: Pamarru SC and Penamaluru. Vamsi Vallabhaneni is the present MLA of the constituency
column8: who won the 2019 Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly election from Telugu Desam Party. As of 25 March 2019
